00014         {
00015                 WorldState* state = new WorldState();

00017                 GameObject* background = new GameObject();
00018                 background->usesPhysics = false;
00019                 background->setSprite("Backgrounds\\background");
00020                 state->addBackgroundObject(background);
00021

00027

00030                 opponent->setSprite("Hulls\\Fighter1");

00033                         ->addChild((new PriorityNode())
00034                                 ->addChild((new SequentialNode())
00035                                         ->addChild(new IntCondition<GameObject>(&GameObject::getHealth,GREATER_THAN,50))
00036                                         ->addChild(new Fire())
00037                                         ->addChild(new Cooldown(1000)))
00038                                 ->addChild(makeHomingBrain()));

00040                 return state;
00041         }
